DOC.brief_title: Rest Time Gain Aerobic Anaerobic Performance
DOC.detailed_description: 12-week experiment conduct , total 30 high intensity interval training ( HIIT ) session cycle ergometer . Both first last week serve stabilize basic value also repeat training . So , every day hold : 1 ) risk stratification coronary artery disease , anthropometric measurement , cardiopulmonary test maximum effort ; 2 ) stabilization cardiopulmonary test value , determine aerobic dependent variable : VO2max , peak power - PP , occurrence power VO2max - PVO2MÃ¡x , maximum heart rate - HRMax , well familiarization HIIT protocol ; 3 ) anaerobic performance test 30 second determine anaerobic dependent variable : peak lactate - LA , anaerobic power peak - PP , average power - PM . After dependent variable establish , subject randomly distribute among three group : two experimental one control , subject 30 session HIIT ( ) 30 second stimulation cycle ergometer , differentiate recovery time ( 60 second 120 second ) . The control group one continuous aerobic exercise ( 50-55 % VO2max ) average time similar training .
